text: Teuma nyang keubit kaphe keu Allah 1 Barangsoe kaphe lheuh jimeuiman Muruka Tuhan keu jih that leupah Meulengkan ureueng nyang bit jipaksa Iman geuh teuma hana meuubah Lam ate gopnyan teutap meuiman Ureueng nyang meunan hana meusalah Tapi nyang peuhah dada keu kaphe Hana jitem le iman keu Allah Ureueng nyan teuma muruka Tuhan Azeub keu jihnyan raya sileupah
